items.title: Warren Buffett gave this timely investment advice at Berkshire’s annual meeting
items.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO had some wise words for investors after a tumultuous April for equities.

items.title: Services sector, the main engine of the U.S. economy, strengthened in April
items.description: Manufacturing has dominated the news because of tariffs, but uncertainty has spread over into the services sector.

items.title: Why tariffs are actually going to boost U.S. companies — and the stock market
items.description: Wall Street is not the economy, and Trump should remind Americans of that.

items.title: Nvidia and these other tech stocks look like winners this earnings season
items.description: Analysts are “relieved” after Big Tech companies remained committed to large AI budgets.

items.title: Skechers’ stock rockets on buyout deal after tumbling in wake of tariff concerns
items.description: Last week, the company reported results that missed expectations and withdrew its full-year outlook.
